attributes.title: SCAM
attributes.review: Do not get this app. I would write a whole review, however the review by @snufflekitty says it all. This is not really a Trump app. DO NOT DONATE MONEY.

attributes.title: App is useless
attributes.review: I put my phone number in as the app requested. I sent to get the code so that I can put in to continues, but I never get the code. I tried many times. I still can not use my app yet.

attributes.title: Great app
attributes.review:
Very solid app, much needed. 
Finally able to get real news without censorship from Facebook, Twitter, youtube, & CNN

It’s obvious the negative review are from the Demo🐭 lol.

attributes.title: TRUMP2020
attributes.review: I am new to this app (thank you me president for allowing me to be added to your list) so idk much yet. However, I do know something/someone REAL when I see it. President Trump is EXACTLY what we needed in the Oval Office. He wasn’t a politician, he wasn’t buddies with all the former presidents. He’s a successful business man with an phenomenal book. I’ve followed him for years. He is NOT this monster the media and far left try to mage ya think he is. Our economy was the best it’s been in yearssssss! Taxes were cut SO much good.and what  Ppl don’t like him cuz he talks back? I’ve never in my 32 years on this earth SEEN or HEARD ANYYYYYBODYYYYY disrespect the POTUS. EVER!!!!!! You NEVERRRRRR heard a tv spokesman call him by name ie Trump or Donald Trump!!!! There is NO respect for him and THAT is the biggest problem here. You have my vote Mr Present. And most of my family, friends, colleagues as well. Thank you and everyone on your team for Making America Great Again ✌🏻

attributes.title: Not sending verification code
attributes.review: I really really really want this app!! But it’s not sending me a verification code. I’ve tried three times after waiting a reasonable amount of time. The code should come instantly via text. Needs a bug fix on the iPhone.

attributes.title: Code doesn’t work, can’t get in
attributes.review: I would love to love the APP but I can’t even get a code to sign up. The one they sent, is saying “not valid”🤷🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: Can’t even oven app
attributes.review: You can’t even get a code

attributes.title: Won’t send code
attributes.review: I’ve tried four times now to sign up in the app and still no code. 🤷🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: Not receiving code to log into app, but did receive code to download
